title: Intensive Management Course Utilizing Flipped Learning in a Blended Learning Environment

context.prior_knowledge: Basic business administration concepts and practical work experience
context.additional_context: Conducted in a smartphone-based LMS environment, non-face-to-face education with limited real-time interaction.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately explain core concepts in entrepreneurship, marketing, and strategy by at least 80% through pre-learning materials in a flipped learning environment.
Learners enhance practical application skills through case-based problem-solving activities with peer practitioners in asynchronous discussion forums.
Learners achieve at least 75% mastery of learning content through formative assessments (quizzes, discussion participation) and incorporate feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
